thread.title: Gigi Hadid gets South Park treatment
thread.title_full: Gigi Hadid gets South Park treatment

title: Gigi Hadid gets South Park treatment
text:
Gigi Hadid gets South Park treatment 1:04 AM Network Writers GIGI Hadid has been immortalised in a South Park episode where she takes on body shamers. Check out the animated model in action. There’s no denying Micallef’s Ex-PM 0:00 AM Tiffany Dunk National TV Editor WHEN Shaun Micallef needed a ‘big, smiley-faced butcher’ for a scene in the next episode of comedy The Ex-PM he knew who fitted the bill. 0:00 AM ANNE MATHER HOLD on to your pirate’s hat, nautical adventures await at the Seafarer’s Festival. Cooper cooks up a sizzling story 0:00 AM Nick Dent BRADLEY Cooper’s latest film Burnt dishes up a satisfying insight into the high-stakes world of fine dining. Wacky romp sews seeds of confusion 0:00 AM NICK DENT THE Dressmaker seems to advertise its intentions pretty clearly — outback feel-good rom-com, right? — then goes ahead and rips them into rags. Rix lands wicked role in ghostly musical 0:00 AM Chris Hook Arts writer AFTER almost a decade playing the Wicked Witch of the West, actress Jemma Rix is swapping her broomstick for a pottery wheel, to play Molly in Ghost the Musical with former co-star Rob Mills. Gigi Hadid gets South Park treatment October 25, 2015 12:04am Spoof ... Gigi Hadid has been vocal on body shaming. Picture: Getty Network Writers News Corp Australia Network Share GIGI Hadid has been immortalised in a South Park episode where she takes on body shamers. The supermodel took to Twitter after it aired. Hadid, 20, appeared on an episode in which Eric Cartman quits Twitter because of body shaming. Gigi Hadid on South Park “I’ve been informed that I was on South Park this week for aprox 5 seconds ... so that’s officially the most iconic 5 seconds of my existence,” Hadid wrote on Twitter. I've been informed that I was on South Park this week for aprox 5 seconds.. soo that's officially the most iconic 5 seconds of my existence. — Gigi Hadid (@GiGiHadid) October 23, 2015 A wise man once said, "f 'em if they can't take a joke." — Gigi Hadid (@GiGiHadid) October 23, 2015 Hadid was clearly able to see the funny side of the episode, even if the animated version of herself looked a little trashy. She was joined in the episode by animations of Demi Lovato, Vin Diesel and Steven Seagal. Celebfest ... Versions of Gigi Hadid and Demi Lovato have appeared in South Park. Picture: Supplied Source: Supplied None of the other celebrities who appeared in the episode have commented. Star ... Gigi Hadid as she looks normally. Picture: Getty Source: Getty Images Animated ... Gigi Hadid has been immortalised in an episode of South Park. Picture: Supplied Source: Supplied Hadid’s appearance in South Park comes after she recently took on the internet trolls who criticised her during New York Fashion Week. 
She said she was happy that women of all shapes and sizes could become models these days. Gigi hits back 
Hadid is currently dating singer Joe Jonas after splitting from Australian Cody Simpson. 
She has also been working to raise awareness of Lyme disease, a condition that affects her mother, Real Housewives of Beverly Hills star Yolanda Foster, as well as her siblings Bella and Anwar. Family ... (L-R) Gigi Hadid, Anwar Hadid, Yolanda Foster and Bella Hadid attend the Global Lyme Alliance’s "Uniting for a Lyme-Free World" Inaugural Gala. Picture: Getty Source: Getty Images
